data.title: Report: Trump Administration Picks 5 Coronavirus Vaccine Candidates to Support
data.text: The White House reportedly plans to route extra federal funds and other assistance to the companies developing those potential SARS-CoV-2 vaccines.

data.title: Moderna May Not Be What Speculators Thought
data.text: With demand sky-high for a coronavirus vaccine, it was only natural that MRNA stock jumped higher on Moderna’s encouraging early stage clinical trial results. However, its questionable practices are now coming into closer view.

data.title: Why Moderna Shares Rose 33.7% in May
data.text: Positive data from a coronavirus vaccine trial drove share gains.

data.title: Is a COVID-19 Vaccine Supply Glut on the Way?
data.text: Dozens of drugmakers are developing COVID-19 vaccines and gearing up to produce billions of doses each year.

data.title: What To Expect As Moderna’s Covid-19 Vaccine Commences Phase 2 Trials
data.text: Moderna said that it commenced stage 2 trials for its new Coronavirus vaccine candidate mRNA-1273 last week. The company intends to enroll a total of 600 participants in the study, up from 45 participants in the phase 1 study.
